title: Best of Patreon: August 2022
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of August. Subscribe today to get full segments plus hundreds of hours of past content.
 
Today you'll hear:

Relationship Advice - Soup Tubes

AITA Listener Edition - Mom in a Bag

August Live Q&A - The Terrors of Space and the Ocean

August Minisode - TikTok Conspiracies around Bebop and Bebe

 

 If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits and to subscribe today! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
